heading: Meteor Sorcerer Endgame Build Guide
content: Welcome to the Meteor Sorcerer Endgame Guide! So, you woke up today and were like, "I want to be a ." Completely relatable - we've all had those days. Regrettably, our current technology does not support this sort of wild and drastic (but admirable) lifestyle transformation, so perhaps vicariously existing as one through the incantations of the Sorcerer can help fill that void. The goal of the Sorcerer is to rain fiery impending doom and destruction on anything in its path, and to look good doing it. The build works really well when you decimate everything in seconds, but may get overwhelmed if fights are long against high level monsters.
